Description: Fragment of linen cloth; medium-coarse quality. Multiple blue band above long twisted warp fringe; other edges torn or ragged. The weave is plain [warp-faced simple tabby] and the threads are S-spun and S-spliced; the stitch gauge is warp c.17 ends per 10mm and weft 9 picks per 10mm. The warp fringe is made of two groups of 3-4 threads "z-plied" then "s-twisted" together.
Bibliographic references: McArthur et al 2015 / The conservation and technical investigation of a hollow-cast Egyptian bronze (p.116, fig.7b)
